short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A text management tool that helps AI enthusiasts save and quickly access their most effective prompts with descriptions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Text Plus - AI Prompt Manager

Streamline your AI interactions with this lightweight yet powerful text management tool. Perfect for anyone working with Claude, Grok, Gemini, ChatGPT or other AI platforms.

Key Features:
- Quick Save: Store any text with custom descriptions for easy reference
- One-Click Copy: Instantly copy stored prompts to your clipboard
- Clean Interface: Minimalist design with smooth interactions
- Local Storage: All your prompts are stored locally for privacy
- Keyboard Shortcuts: Use Enter to save and Escape to close

Ideal for:
- AI enthusiasts storing effective prompts
- Writers keeping track of conversation starters
- Developers managing code snippets
- Anyone who frequently reuses text in their workflow

How it works:
Simply add your text with a descriptive label, and access it anytime with a single click. The extension stays out of your way until you need it, closing automatically after copying for seamless workflow integration.

Privacy-focused: All data is stored locally in your browser. No external servers, no tracking.
